title: Cannot Synchronize a .java File and Another Resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the synchronization process fails to work as expected.
OB: When I try to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the synchronization process does not work properly.
EB: I expect that when I synchronize a .java file with another resource, the synchronization process should complete successfully without any errors or issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the file you want to synchronize (a .java file) and another resource.
3. Right-click on the .java file.
4. Choose the 'Synchronize' option.
5. Observe the synchronization process and note any errors or issues that occur.
